SEARCH
Package chess.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
chess.board.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a chessboard with an 8x8 grid of squares. Handles piece placement, movement, captures, castling, check, checkmate, stalemate, and board display.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Constructs a new Board and sets up pieces in their initial positions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a new Board and sets up pieces in their initial positions.

  • Method Details

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the board of all pieces and resets captured piece lists. Useful for testing or restarting a game.

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds(Position pos)
      Checks if a given position is within the bounds of the board.
      Parameters:
      pos - Position to check
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid, false otherwise

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece(Position pos)
      Returns the piece at a given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - Position to query
      Returns:
      Piece at the position, or null if empty

    • setPiece

      public void setPiece(Position pos, Piece piece)
      Places a piece at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      pos - Position to place the piece
      piece - Piece to place (can be null)

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece(Position from, Position to)
      Moves a piece from one position to another. Handles captures, castling, and updating piece movement flags.
      Parameters:
      from - Starting position
      to - Destination position

    • isCheck

      public boolean isCheck(boolean white)
      Returns true if the king of the given color is currently in check.
      Parameters:
      white - Color of king
      Returns:
      true if the king is under attack

    • findKing

      public Position findKing(boolean white)
      Finds the king's position for the given color.
      Parameters:
      white - Color of king
      Returns:
      Position of the king, or null if not found

    • wouldBeInCheck

      public boolean wouldBeInCheck(Piece piece, Position to)
      Simulates a move and checks if it would leave the player's king in check.
      Parameters:
      piece - Piece to move
      to - Destination position
      Returns:
      true if the move would leave the king in check

    • canCastleKingside

      public boolean canCastleKingside(boolean white)
      Checks if castling kingside is allowed for the given color.
      Parameters:
      white - Color to check
      Returns:
      true if kingside castling is legal

    • canCastleQueenside

      public boolean canCastleQueenside(boolean white)
      Checks if castling queenside is allowed for the given color.
      Parameters:
      white - Color to check
      Returns:
      true if queenside castling is legal

    • hasAnyValidMoves

      public boolean hasAnyValidMoves(boolean white)
      Returns true if the given color has at least one legal move available.
      Parameters:
      white - Color to check
      Returns:
      true if at least one valid move exists

    • isCheckmate

      public boolean isCheckmate(boolean white)
      Returns true if the given color is in checkmate.
      Parameters:
      white - Color to check
      Returns:
      true if checkmate

    • isStalemate

      public boolean isStalemate(boolean white)
      Returns true if the given color is in stalemate.
      Parameters:
      white - Color to check
      Returns:
      true if stalemate

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the board and captured pieces in the console.
